video.title: The Tomorrow People
video.synopsis: A group of young people with evolved powers battle evil using their special talents that include teleportation and telepathic communication.

episodes.synopsis: Stephen first encounters the Tomorrow People and gets a surprise that he hopes will help him understand his father's mysterious disappearance.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: When Ultra tries to probe Stephen's brain, he looks to his fellow Tomorrow People for help but is rebuffed by an angry John.
episodes.title: In Too Deep

episodes.synopsis: Stephen attends a party with Astrid but is startled when he hears that one of his classmates is in peril. Stephen turns to John and Cara for help.
episodes.title: Girl, Interrupted

episodes.synopsis: When Ultra's most wanted, Killian McCrane, resurfaces after years of being in hiding, John reluctantly agrees to help Stephen track him down.
episodes.title: Kill or Be Killed

episodes.synopsis: After Stephen breaks Ultra protocol during a training exercise, Jedikiah's mysterious boss insists on meeting Stephen.
episodes.title: All Tomorrow's Parties

episodes.synopsis: When Stephen and Russell head out for a night of fun, they run into a potential new breakout and report it to John and Cara.
episodes.title: Sorry for Your Loss

episodes.synopsis: When Stephen decides to have some fun with his newfound powers, Jedikiah takes extreme measures to make sure it doesn't happen again.
episodes.title: Limbo

episodes.synopsis: Determined to uncover what he hopes is the key to finding his father, Stephen crafts a plan with the Tomorrow People to get inside Jedikiah's head.
episodes.title: Thanatos

episodes.synopsis: When John finds himself in a dangerous situation, Stephen is unable to help without revealing himself to Ultra.
episodes.title: Death's Door

episodes.synopsis: After Stephen returns from the brink, he thinks he knows what happened to his father, but his fellow Tomorrow People are not sure they believe him.
episodes.title: The Citadel

episodes.synopsis: Stephen and the other Ultra trainees are given a test by Jedikiah to see who is worthy of becoming an agent, but not everyone wants to work as a team.
episodes.title: Rumble

episodes.synopsis: Stephen feels uneasy about his fellow trainee Hillary, who has a secret agenda. Stephen's mom wants the family to go camping with her new boyfriend.
episodes.title: Sitting Ducks

episodes.synopsis: Stephen is upset with Jedikiah for going back on his word, leaving Stephen to face the Founder. To protect Astrid, Stephen makes a dangerous deal.
episodes.title: Things Fall Apart

episodes.synopsis: After getting some shocking news, Stephen attempts to restore order in both of his worlds by making a deal with Jedikiah.
episodes.title: Brother's Keeper

episodes.synopsis: Julian is back and angrier than ever, but when he gets caught by Ultra, he's forced to strike a deal that could cost him his and Stephen's lives.
episodes.title: Enemy of My Enemy

episodes.synopsis: Stephen is still walking a fine line with his Ultra partner, Hillary, who continues to be suspicious of his loyalties.
episodes.title: Superhero

episodes.synopsis: Stephen stumbles on a clue that the Tomorrow People have been desperately pursuing. John and Russell learn of a plan that Jedikiah has in the works.
episodes.title: Endgame

episodes.synopsis: Fed up with Jedikiah's constant lies about his father, Stephen makes a choice about his alliances. Meanwhile, Stephen's brother Luca goes missing.
episodes.title: Smoke and Mirrors

episodes.synopsis: Stephen's diligent work as a double agent seems to be paying off with a potential truce between the Tomorrow People and Ultra.
episodes.title: Modus Vivendi

episodes.synopsis: With Roger's possible return on the horizon, everyone is concerned about the consequences if the Founder were to find out.
episodes.title: A Sort of Homecoming

episodes.synopsis: When the Tomorrow People learn about the serum they were injected with, Stephen and Cara buy time for Jedikiah while he tries to create an antidote.
episodes.title: Kill Switch

episodes.synopsis: Russell realizes his alliance with the Founder was a mistake and tries to make up for his decision by saving Cara from an Ultra ambush.
episodes.title: Son of Man
